title: All By Myself
subtle: Descriptive (fiction), 40 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: One of the most exciting parts of being a kid is learning to do things independently. All By Myself follows a young girl as she demonstrates the many things she can do by herself. Through the use of real-life experiences and engaging illustrations, readers are invited to make text-to-self connections, identify setting, and strengthen high-frequency words.
meta: build, color, dress, listen, myself, think
Blend Onset and Rime : Blend onset and rime sounds
Capitalization and Punctuation : Recognize and use accurate capitalization and punctuation
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word all

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
